message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it holds significant value that will benefit you greatly.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $12,000 is outside my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $7,000 at this time. Let's see if we can work something out.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 represents the product's true value, I'm willing to come down to $10,000.  This is my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $10,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $8,500. This is a fair price that benefits both of us.
